name: Bubba's Magical Soda!
description:
Bubba's Magical Soda is a game made in a week for the Weekly Game Jam #146. The Theme was "Mountain Climber". 

Use WASD to move Bubba.

Mouse to aim and click to shoot.

Space to switch between the soda and the shotgun.

The soda will teleport you, but since it is a magical soda, it is wonky, and doesn't always work. Should you depend your life on it...

The shotgun reverses your current velocity. For example, if you are going very fast down, you will go fast upwards if you shoot with the shotgun.

Programming and Art made by PotatoOfShadows.

Sound made by @nolesounds.
